record.field: 1. Which of the following qualities are required to be a mentor?
2. If a manager develops a new idea and gives a plan for development of a new product in his workplace, then he is carrying out which of the following roles?
3. What do employees look forward to in a job?
4. _______ are commonly used job simulations in Assessment Centers
5. Administrative use of Performance Assessment includes:
6. Which of the following code represents the full form of the term “BARS” in performance management systems?
A. Business Appraisal and Rating Systems
7. Change management challenges the status quo
8. Competency model links which two parameters:
9. What is the aim of Skill inventory?
B. Finding out the star performers
C. Identifying the ability of a particular employee to take up higher positions
10. Counseling works best in which of the following scenarios?
C. When motivation is the reason for low performance
11. How do you reward a team?
12. What is the purpose of counseling?
A. Know about the personal life of an employee
B. Help employee identify the reasons for poor performance and improve
C. Give employee a chance to discuss with management
13. How would you manage more than one goal efficiently?
B. By working on them simultaneously
C. By setting by a good leadership example
14. What is the purpose of counseling?
A. To solve psychological problems of employees
B. To encourage people to accept their own performance and help them develop
C. To help people achieve their KPIs
15. Which of the following are the qualities of an effective appraisal system?
C. Failure to follow a workplace rule
17. What are the qualities of an effective goal?
B. It is attainable and relevant
18. Which of the following psychological tests is conducted for employee development?
A. The Myers - Briggs Type Indicator
19. Management by Objectives is also called as ______
20. ______ is also called as Performance Management
21. Steps involves in employer's movement for performance management is _____
22. For performance assessment of employees, “helping to meet legal requirements” is the applicant of which one of the following?
23. Steps involves in employer's movement for performance management is _____
24. In performance management, main feature of performance management is to
D. comparing sales figures from last year
25. An advantage of Management by Objectives (MBO) is
A. avoids central tendency and biases
26. One of the main reasons for the negative attitude of employees towards performance appraisal is _____
A. it is associated with pay
B. it gives away how bad they are
C. it tends to become subjective because of poor implementation
D. it is not useful for any other organizational activity
27. When one negative work factor or thing you dislike affects the rating of an employee, it is known as?
28. 540-degree feedback includes certain dimensions. Which of the following is the correct set of dimensions?
A. Appraiser, Appraisee, Peers, Subordinates, Customers
29. Google has incorporated many changes in its performance management system over the years. One of the innovative approaches is _____
30. The Balanced Scorecard includes all of the following perspectives, except:
